info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: Backward Clock
collection.openText: "...Is your future totally grim? Have you hit absolute rock bottom, not a single way out in sight?"

specialTipSize.specialTip: One light turns on and energy is charged for each work done with $0.
Nothing happened when employees lower than Level 3 attempted to work with it.
After all the lights have been turned on, $0 can be activated. However, $0 can only be utilized once a day, so please use it wisely.
<Caution> Employees under Level 5 are strictly forbidden from making any contact with $0 after it has been fully charged.
Only Level 5 employees can operate $0 normally. $0 will send all except the operator to the most peaceful time of the day.
